name.description: The globally unique name (=id) of the plugin.

displayName.description: Visible human readable name of the plugin. Defaults to 'name' if not set.

author.description: The name of the author of this plugin.

description.description: A short textual description for the plugin.

localization.description: The relative path to the folder containing the localization files.

executionMode.description: The context in which the plugin process will be executed.

settings.description: The setting fields for this plugin.
